content.description: The following question is based on the excerpt below.
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the dynamics?

choices.label: The music begins softly and ends loudly.
The music begins medium softly and ends medium loudly.
The music begins loud, gets gradually louder, and then gets gradually softer.
The music begins loud, gets gradually softer, and then gets gradually louder.

content.answer: The music begins loud, gets gradually louder, and then gets gradually softer.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in notated music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
